projects.title: Wolf & Badger website
projects.description: Work with a team of freelance web developers to complete various tasks and bugs on existing code base. I work on both frontend and Django backend code.

projects.title: Bomberg website
projects.description: An E-commerce website complete with a CMS. The frontend uses modern web technologies to give users an exciting experience. Contains Instagram integration for managing and displaying images that have Bomberg hashtags.

projects.title: Jeff Biegel website
projects.description: A responsive single-page app that allows all content to be managed by Jeff Biegel without the need for a custom CMS solution. All content comes directly from Facebook, YouTube, and SoundCloud using their APIs.

projects.title: Combat2College website
projects.description: A responsive pageless website for a non-profit organization.  Integrated with Facebook so Combat2College can create events on their Facebook page and they will show up on their website.  Also has integration with PayPal for donations and MailChimp for email subscriptions.
